suggest.title: Suggest a Cafe
suggest.description: Your cafe is missing? Write us a simple email with the name and address of your cafe and we will add it to our website.

reviews.title: Work related reviews
reviews.description: We have selected relevant reviews that we consider to be important information to determine if this cafe is work-friendly. Related keywords like "work" and "wifi" are highlighted to make it easier to find the information you need.
reviews.no_reviews_description: For this cafe, no reviews with relevant information were found.

faq.title: Frequently Asked <highlight>Questions</highlight>
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about our cafe recommendations and selection process.
faq.goal-of-report.question: What is the goal of reporting a cafe?
faq.goal-of-report.answer: The goal of reporting a cafe is to help us to improve the quality of the cafe recommendations. If you notice any changes in a listed cafe or if it no longer meets work-friendly standards, please use our feedback form. We'll investigate and update our information accordingly.
faq.cases-when-report.question: What are example cases when I should report a cafe?
faq.cases-when-report.answer: You can report a cafe if it is not working-friendly and does not meet our criteria. Or if you are the owner of the cafe and want to remove it from our website.

slug.description: {{name}} in {{city}} is a great place to work, study or exchange. We have checked the reviews and selected the best cafes for you.
